name: Combobox 🤖
description:
Combobox 🤖

Navigate through space with a tiny robot combining boxes with unique features!

Controls
  • WASD / arrows - player movement. Use these key sets separately in multiplayer mode.
  • Left / Right Shift - grab box.
  • Space - jump.
Boxes

There are 6 types of boxes in the game. Try to combine them to see how they change the world around you:

  • Standard - just a normal ordinary box.
  • Buff - buffs properties of the box it merges with.
  • Undo -  undoes the last merge.
  • Direction - changes the direction of the box it merges with.
  • Gravity - changes gravity on the scene.
  • Lamp - illuminates the space around it.
